text: The 2008 All Thailand Golf Tour is the 10th season of the All Thailand Golf Tour, the main professional golf tour in Thailand since it was established in 1999. ==Tournament results== The table below shows the 2008 schedule. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" !Date !! Tournament !! Location !! Prize money men (฿) !! Prize money women (฿) !! Men's winner !! Women's winner |- | 30 Mar || Singha Masters || Santiburi Country Club Chiang Rai || align=right|2,000,000 || align=center|– || Prayad Marksaeng || align=center|– |- | 23 Apr || Singha Pattaya Open || Burapha Golf Club (C-D) || align=right|1,500,000 || align=right|100,000 || Kritsada Rangwat || Thidapa Suwannapura (a) |- | 7 Sep || B-Ing TPC Championships || Pattana Golf & Sports Resort (A-B) || align=right|1,600,000 || align=center|– || Felix Casas || align=center|– |} ==References== Category:All Thailand Golf Tour All Thailand Golf Tour
title: 2008 All Thailand Golf Tour
